about-me.description1: I am passionate about coding and like to find solutions to complex problems. With approx of 2 years of experience in the field, I have developed a skillset in frontend and backend code development, and I am always eager to learn and take on new challenges.
about-me.description2: My approach to development is analytical, and I believe that this is essential for success. I am dedicated to delivering high-quality work (on time) that meets the requirements while pushing the boundaries of what I can and know.
about-me.description3: In my free time, I like to spend time learning new things and experimenting, which helps to keep me inspired and motivated.
about-me.description4: If you are looking for a person who has "fire" for doing things, do not leave when it is hard, always give his best, and always strive to improve, I would love to hear from you.

soft-skills1.pressure: Work under pressure, Willpower and discipline

experience1.multiple-addition: Working on multiple projects including full-time and side clients (2+ years)
experience1.assessment: Projects assessment of students (1.5+ years) in SoftUni
experience1.assessment2: as part of the evaluator committee

education1.primary: Primary education completed at the construction,
education1.software: Software Engineering, Full Stack Developer at SoftUni

softuni.name: SoftUni
softuni.position: Evaluator of Student Web Application Projects
softuni.description:
This is a hourly second job, on a civil contract. 
The work consists to being part of on examination committee that evaluates how a student has managed to create and implement a web application, based on a pre-set criteria.

akkodis.name: Akkodis Bulgaria Ltd.
akkodis.description:
Frontend: Creating and editing of small components and bug fixes.
Backend: Creating a custom API to start and run integration tests, as well as creating new REST endpoints and bugs fixing. Implementing new features and code cleanup.

akkodis1.name: Akkodis Bulgaria Ltd.
akkodis1.description:
Frontend: Code refactoring and creating completely new pages and components from scratch. Optimizing performance, integrating external libraries, and implementing new features.
Backend: Code refactoring, implementing new features, creating new REST endpoints, optimizing performance, and helping of teammates to integrate external dependencies.
